### Tender Announcement for Remediation Works Along the Alaska Highway in British Columbia

**Contract Details**

* **Tender Number:** WS4170132187-Doc4367776997
* **Reference Number:** WS4170132187-Doc4367776997
* **Contracting Agency:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** Brandie Klyne
* **Contact Email:** brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Project Overview**

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for remediation works at multiple sites along the Alaska Highway in northern British Columbia. The project aims to bring the maintenance camps into alignment with federal contaminated site management goals as defined by the Federal Contaminated Sites Action Plan (FCSAP).

**Project Locations**

The project involves the remediation of soil treatment facilities at the following locations:

- Triple J Gravel Pit (km 834)
- Liard Soil Treatment Facility (km 763)
- KM 713 Gravel Pit (km 713)
- Stringer Soil Treatment Facility (km 639)
- Sikanni Soil Treatment Facility (km 254)

**Scope of Work**

The scope of work includes the offsite disposal of contaminated soil and site treatment facility decommissioning at select sites. Optional work may include soil screening at select sites.

**Contract Requirements**

- The successful contractor will operate within designated work areas.
- Infrastructure at the camps will not be available to the contractor.
- Petroleum hydrocarbons are the primary contaminants of concern in soil across all sites.

**Procurement Details**

- **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective tendering
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Timeline**

- **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-10-27
- **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-02-29
